annotations.description: This cocktail is a small tweak on an existing drink which makes a big difference. The Business With Pleasure was created in 2016 by Zachary Gelnaw-Rubin at L...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Business With Pleasure

textContent:
1.5oz (45ml) Gin
.75oz (22.5ml) Pineapple Juice
.75oz (22.5ml) Lime Juice
.5oz (15ml) Honey Syrup

Shake and strain into coupe

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cI3ypJZ_kP8
title: Business with Pleasure
